title: Ticket #2529: 32-bit condor reports ImageSize capped around 4GB
description:
We observed a case where a job's memory usage was underreported by glideinWMS, because 32-bit condor was being used.

The 32-bit glidein condor reported 

   ImageSize_RAW = 4209307

The 64-bit host condor correctly reported: 

   ImageSize_RAW = 45505444

Interestingly, ResidentSetSize was correctly reported by the 32-bit condor: 

   ResidentSetSize = 33700972
remarks:
2011-Oct-07 16:30:51 by danb:
Note that the 4GB limit is actually applied per process, not per job. So a job containing two 10GB processes would report about 8GB for ImageSize.

2011-Oct-10 14:07:07 by psilord:
Did you only fix this for linux?

2011-Oct-10 14:36:31 by psilord:
Other than it looking like you only fixed it for linux, the patch itself is ok. I sign off on it.
